m_szDocTitle: Rep. Paul Tonko And Rep. Chris Gibson Visit Plug Power  | WAMC
m_szDocSumamry: Rep. Paul Tonko And Rep. Chris Gibson Visit Plug Power Congressman Paul Tonko, Plug Power CEO Andy Marsh, Congressman Chris Gibson WAMC photo by Dave Lucas Plug Power products ready to be shipped around the world. WAMC Photo by Dave Lucas Reps. Gibson and Tonko chat with a Plug Power employee. WAMC photo by Dave Lucas Reps. Gibson and Tonko at Plug Power , Latham NY (February 2016) WAMC photo by Dave Lucas Listen / 2:07 Two powerful Capital Region congressmen on the opposite sides of the aisle met in Latham Tuesday afternoon to tour the Plug Power facility.
